name: Interactive promotion
uniques: [This Unit] heals [10] HP <when adjacent to a [RustedWar.Building.Rehabilitatedbay] unit> <upon turn end>
[This Unit] heals [10] HP <when adjacent to a [StarCraft.Unit.Medivac] unit> <for [StarCraft.Biology] units> <upon turn end>

name: Collection CrystallineOre
uniques: [This Unit] loses the [Collection CrystallineOre] promotion <when adjacent to a [StarCraft.Building.CommandCenter] unit> <costs [-15] [CrystallineOre]> <for [2] movement>

name: Collection Mashgas
uniques: [This Unit] loses the [Collection Mashgas] promotion <when adjacent to a [StarCraft.Building.CommandCenter] unit> <costs [-15] [Mashgas]> <for [2] movement>

name: Blinding and blowing arrows
uniques: [Target Unit] gains the [Blinding] status for [10] turn(s) <upon damaging a [Military] unit>

name: Toxic shot
uniques: [Target Unit] gains the [Poisoning] status for [10] turn(s) <upon damaging a [Military] unit>
